Q: Hi i had a scan last week and they discovered i had 2 fibroids in my womb and a small lump outside my uterus, they are refering me to a gyn at hospital within 2 weeks.im so worried what could it be?? A: Hi, dear. I have gone through your question. I can understand your concern. You may have leiomyoma.  It is the benign tumor of smooth muscle.  Uterus is the most common site for it. You should go for mastectomy or hysterectomy according to your gynecologist advice.  Don't worries its totally curable.
